attributes.action: legalize marijuana for medicinal purposes and as a smoking substance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are allowed to smoke tobacco, cigarettes, cigars, what is REALLY wrong with marijuana. We are given morphine and other drugs at hospitals, and the effects of marijuana are not very strong at all, unless consuming alcohol at the same time

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
